languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%. An attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} bonus determined by the difference between the attacker's and the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is halved.

traits.locale_text: Reaper's parry chance is increased by (Toughness Bonus)%. Additional critical hit chances that enemies attacking the Reaper receive from the higher weapon skill are reduced by a half.

The Bladedancer's parry is increased by +<u>TGH bonus</u>%. Whenever the Bladedancer is attacked in melee, the attacker gains only half of the critical hit chance bonus defined by the difference between the attacker's and the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill characteristic.

The Bladedancer's parry is increased by +<u>TGH bonus</u>%. Whenever the Bladedancer is attacked in melee, the attacker gains only half of the critical hit chance bonus defined by the difference between the attacker's and the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill characteristic.

The Bladedancer's parry is increased by +<u>TGH bonus</u>%. An attacker's melee critical hit chance bonus determined by the difference between the attacker's and the Bladedancer's Weapon Skill characteristic is halved.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%. An attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} bonus determined by the difference between the attacker's and the Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} is halved.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Парирование{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} увеличивается на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u>%.
